meanings.definition: Extremely exclusive or selective, limited to a small, elite group.
meanings.sent1: The ultraexclusive club only allowed VIP members inside.
meanings.sent2: The ultraexclusive event was attended by only a handful of celebrities.
meanings.sent3: It was so ultraexclusive that even the mayor couldn't get in!
meanings.sent4: The ultraexclusive resort felt like a hidden paradise for the lucky few.
meanings.sent5: The ultraexclusive yacht gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of luxury and privilege.

meanings.definition: Characterized by being highly exclusive or restricted in access.
meanings.sent1: The ultraexclusive store required a special invitation to shop there.
meanings.sent2: The ultraexclusive neighborhood had strict security measures in place.
meanings.sent3: Trying to enter the ultraexclusive party without an invite was a hilarious mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraexclusive taste in fashion set her apart from the rest of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The ultraexclusive club's velvet rope was a barrier to those not on the list.

meanings.definition: Reserved for a select few individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: The ultraexclusive scholarship was awarded to only one student each year.
meanings.sent2: The ultraexclusive restaurant required reservations months in advance.
meanings.sent3: He felt like a king dining at the ultraexclusive table in the corner.
meanings.sent4: The ultraexclusive event felt like a secret society gathering.
meanings.sent5: The ultraexclusive art gallery showcased rare masterpieces to a privileged audience.
